location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Beatrice Lyall Aitchison, Gorton Castle, Simla to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter providing Pelly with news of the departures of various individuals, announcements of recent engagements, and general social news from Simla including the introduction of Badminton which has led to a rising trade in the sale of bats although there have been difficulties in obtaining shuttlecocks.
